lenders.name: laurie
lenders.loan_because: it empowers others and supports assistance with dignity
lenders.occupational_info: I manage a large residential substance abuse treatment program, and assist human service professionals in supporting recovery from addiction.

lenders.name: Carolyn
lenders.loan_because: Initially because I received a gift certificate, but now simply because I like enabling people to make their lives better.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a student currently majoring in human services, and I hope to work with kids or people with disabilities.

lenders.name: Tim
lenders.loan_because: I can; and if I can, how can I not?
lenders.occupational_info: I pay my bills in the computer industry, and feed my soul as a musician.

lenders.name: dave richardson
lenders.loan_because: i believe in this cause. i believe in the potential of humanity, and would like to do my small part in creating the opportunities to move forward.
lenders.occupational_info: i teach graphic design at a university in the Western United States.

lenders.name: Kirk
lenders.loan_because: Like to help people who want to help themselves
lenders.occupational_info: Gold miner

lenders.name: Michael
lenders.loan_because: I can personally help a small business in a developing country grow & flourish, thus helping the surrounding community.  It's my way of helping someone else help themself.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a commercial electrician.  I install electrical equipment, conduit, wiring, lighting, etc. in commercial buildings.  All of the necessary parts of a building to make it function electrically.

lenders.name: Susan
lenders.loan_because: So many have helped me along the way of life - I cannot pay them back - but I can pass the gift along to others.

lenders.name: Sandra
lenders.loan_because: I care about people
lenders.occupational_info: I help people resolve their personal problems

lenders.name: C Family
lenders.loan_because: We loan because we love our neighbors and wish them well.

lenders.name: Jerry
lenders.loan_because: it gives an individual and their community an opportunity to grow and prosper.
lenders.occupational_info: My job is to help companies make better and safer products in efficient  ways.  Also to identify suppliers that can supply my companies with product that meets our needs.  Also, I own my own business of remodeling homes.

lenders.name: Jason
lenders.loan_because: money should not be a barrier to success.  With a good plan, a lot of hard work, and a little luck,  a better life is achievable for anyone.

lenders.name: Holly
lenders.loan_because: We all get through this life with help from others.
lenders.occupational_info: When people are not feeling well they come to me & I use various methods of healing to help make them better.

lenders.name: Stephen
lenders.loan_because: It allows me to use my resources to help others help themselves and their families.  I feel that this is helping the world be a better place to live at the very grass roots level.
lenders.occupational_info: I renew and remodel houses that are old or in need of repair and then resale for a profit.

lenders.name: Dane & Lisa
lenders.loan_because: I can
lenders.occupational_info: I work for an electrical distribution company and my wife is a dance instructor

lenders.name: Bill & Connie
lenders.loan_because: we have the ability to do so, and also we believe in the determination behind these endeavors.
lenders.occupational_info: Correctional Officer/Sales, We also raise gamebirds,honeybees, pork and poultry and both have agricultural backgrounds.

lenders.name: Adolf
lenders.loan_because: No man is an island . We each need or receive a helping hand at some time.

lenders.name: Joseph
lenders.loan_because: It is a joy to help people help themselves.

lenders.name: Claudia
lenders.loan_because: I believe that by lending a helping hand, I can make a significant impact on another person's quality of life.  Random acts of kindness can make the world a better place.
lenders.occupational_info: I am the editor of an international consulting firm's web site.  I help fill up the internet with words.

lenders.name: Sandra
lenders.loan_because: KIVA identifies entrepreneurs with very limited financial resources to support their dreams. It's a privilege to be part of a network of lenders that assures funding to these individuals and KIVA provides the perfect opportunity to complement my financial contribution with others.
lenders.occupational_info: I am responsible for developing policies and procedures to minimize transmission of diseases such as TB and perinatal exposure to hepatitis B and create a framework for public health programs to manage communicable diseases in their jurisdiction.

lenders.name: John
lenders.loan_because: I have the deepest respect for anyone who is trying to improve their lives by working hard.  I have had a few breaks in my lifetime and I feel this my way of paying it forward.
lenders.occupational_info: I sell Screen Printed and Embroidered Clothing to businesses - example - uniforms to fast food restaurants or large companies who want their employees to have the company logo on their clothing.  I am also a musician.  I play guitar in a band - I use the extra money I make from playing music to pay for my kids schooling.

lenders.name: Mary
lenders.loan_because: I have ample enough to share...I believe in the Kiva project and in those requesting assistance.
lenders.occupational_info: I taught Health, Physical Education, and Catholic Religion to adolescent girls in Akron, Ohio and in Louisville, Kentucky, USA. Now, at age 60, I am a homemaker.

lenders.name: Emiel
lenders.loan_because: in my life, I have the opportunity to visit other countries and am able to witness the needs of the people, and the hope and successes that come from being able to realize a real future.  Kiva is a great way to give hope to others so that they can realize their dreams.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a member of a religious community called the Carmelites, and a priest of the Roman Catholic Church.  Apart from my duties as a priest, I help others to come to a deeper relationship with God and help them to recognize the action of God in their lives.  I also do missionary work, bringing the Good News of Jesus Christ to others.

lenders.name: Mike
lenders.loan_because: Why not? It makes good sense really. If you even think about this for a quick minute, that is all it takes. Here you can just put in a couple bucks to help people earn a better living. What  seperates developing countries from the USA is opportunity.  At KIVA we can help people who want to work find better opportunity.
lenders.occupational_info: I publish of a monthly shoppers guide that distributes to our local area.

lenders.name: Cameron
lenders.loan_because: My sister gave me Kiva credit as a Christmas present a few years ago. I enjoy lending because I know the people who use the money get more out of it that I do.
lenders.occupational_info: I study International Environmental Policy, focusing on market-based solutions to environmental conflict.

lenders.name: Mark
lenders.loan_because: this is a tangible way to love others. And through loving others, I love God.
lenders.occupational_info: I help build trucks for Toyota.

lenders.name: Julie
lenders.loan_because: I love knowing that, even with as little as I have, I can help others improve their lives - and instead of giving money to a faceless "group" I have the satisfaction of knowing who I am helping. A great joy!
lenders.occupational_info: Currently, I am probably close to being the world's oldest physics student.  I decided to go back to school to try and achieve a life long dream after living with chronic, incurable cancer for several years (my last chance!).  I don't write much now because I don't have enough energy for school and work both - but my work basically involved writing materials to tell other people about a computer company's products or services.

lenders.name: Doug
lenders.occupational_info: I repair locomotives (trains)

lenders.name: Oscar L
lenders.loan_because: I believe Uganda and it's people have a lot of potential! The people very pleasent and hard working! ( I have spent two weeks in Uganda with my church.) We were the guests of  United Methodist Bishop Daniel Wandabula who is the Bishop of all of East Africa!
lenders.occupational_info: Retired!

lenders.name: Carlos
lenders.loan_because: First; As a 1st generation Mexican-American, I've lived amoungst those who are less fortunate than myself.  Second; I taught myself the meaning of the word "empathy".
lenders.occupational_info: Simply put; Use math to ensure that a set of computer systems are able to effectively communicate effectively amoungst each other.

lenders.name: Chris K
lenders.loan_because: I want to make the world a better place.

lenders.name: Dru
lenders.occupational_info: I'm currently in school to get my BA degree.

lenders.name: John and Pamela
lenders.loan_because: Some people just need a little help and if one is in a position to lend a hand, he/she should.

lenders.name: Mike
lenders.loan_because: I have been very fortunate throughout my life, and I want to help someone else work to achieve their potential.
lenders.occupational_info: I have a great dog.

lenders.name: Madeline
lenders.loan_because: I like to help.
lenders.occupational_info: I am in the process of going to school.

lenders.name: Barbara
lenders.loan_because: the more lives I touch in a positive way, the happier I am.

lenders.name: Ingrid
lenders.loan_because: I feel good after I've done it.

lenders.name: Christina
lenders.loan_because: I want to put my money to work to make a difference in the world.
lenders.occupational_info: Helping people get off welfare and find suitable, sustainable employment.

lenders.name: Trish
lenders.loan_because: "To whom much is given - much is expected"  I am required by the laws of love to pass on my own blessings to others in my world.
lenders.occupational_info: I work with teens who have difficult lives. I try to help them get an education to open doors in their lives and to make good decisions for their present and future.

lenders.name: Katherine
lenders.loan_because: It's a gift that keeps on giving. I think this a great idea to help someone grow, build, and change their life. I can't think of a more rewarding way to contribute.

lenders.name: Cathy
lenders.loan_because: I like the idea of helping people in a way that makes them able to help their families, their communities, and themselves.
lenders.occupational_info: I teach literature to students in grades 9-12 in a suburb of Chicago.  The students from my school come from all over the world.  More than 73% of them speak another language other than English in their homes.  I learn about cultures from all over the world.

lenders.name: Patrick
lenders.loan_because: Microloans make a lot of sense in the developing world and as a more fortunate global inhabitant I consider it a duty.
lenders.occupational_info: I manage the scripting group at Red Storm Entertainment working on the next generation of video games.

lenders.name: Bernard
lenders.loan_because: I was born in Haiti ,so i know first handed how good  it will do to people lives.

lenders.name: Peter & Rosanne
lenders.loan_because: "Real generosity toward the future lies in giving all to the present.” Albert Camus
lenders.occupational_info: Peter is a sales manager & I work with young people in a residential unit.

lenders.name: Jay
lenders.loan_because: I believe in the merits of the work started by Mohammed Yunus.
lenders.occupational_info: Consultant to physicians to guide them thru business development opportunities.

lenders.name: FAON
lenders.loan_because: To put the needs of others before my own. The returns will multiply to keep the help going. Give your life away. We came with NO THING AND WILL LEAVE WITH NO THING.
lenders.occupational_info: CLINICAL LABORATORY

lenders.name: Warren
lenders.loan_because: God has blessed me so many ways in my life. Making loans through KIVA is my way of thanking God for all he has given to me.

lenders.name: Jessica
lenders.loan_because: I want to make a difference where I can't physically be. Also, I want people to get the best out of life that they can. I think this website makes this possible.
lenders.occupational_info: I work at a local organic co-op. I bag groceries and help people find what they need.

lenders.name: Eric
lenders.loan_because: In an environment of cynicism and chicanery I am glad to find a personal way to help make a difference.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a home builder, remodeler and carpenter in Northern California.  I also design much of what I build.

lenders.name: Katy
lenders.loan_because: I want to help out in any way I can.

lenders.name: Katherine
lenders.loan_because: I am on Disability, this is a way for me to contribute and not have to have alot of money. We have so much compared to so many others.
lenders.occupational_info: I love to work with flowers, arranging them for dinners, and gatherings.

lenders.name: Bobby
lenders.loan_because: We want to help decent people in the developing world.
lenders.occupational_info: I do fundamental research in mathematical physics (string theory). My wife is doing cancer research.

lenders.name: Joe
lenders.loan_because: This is a cool way to assist others so they may help themselves and is not promoting expansion of a welfare mindset.
lenders.occupational_info: I work on the design and implementation of automation systems for various manufacturing companies

lenders.name: Sean
lenders.loan_because: I care about helping others to be good stewards with their businesses. We all need the help at some time, Jesus tells us to help and Love one another.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a Designer of Church communications, helping to spread the Gospel to the World.

lenders.name: Annie
lenders.loan_because: I believe that the micro-loan business model truly works!

lenders.name: kathryn
lenders.loan_because: Kiva borrowers sincerely work to improve their situation and therefore desire our help

lenders.name: Harry and Jackie
lenders.loan_because: We want to help people "learn how to fish" for a better life
lenders.occupational_info: volunteer work - unpaid, but very satisfying

lenders.name: Peggy
lenders.loan_because: It is a marvelous way to assist another to help themselves to make a better living and provide for their family while improving their living conditions and life style.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a retired business woman.  I worked for 35 years as a professional.  My working career included medical technology, communications industry and the travel industry.

lenders.name: The Lavista Gang
lenders.loan_because: through Kiva our family is learning two important life skills: financial literacy and  real generosity - besides global connectivity, entrepeneurial spirit, and many other things....
lenders.occupational_info: We are four folks.  Two go to school; one teaches design at a local university, the other designs buildings around the world.

lenders.name: Steve
lenders.loan_because: Because fortune does not smile equally on all people. I like to think I am helping the less fortunate.
lenders.occupational_info: Retired from local Government.

lenders.name: Joey & Katie
lenders.loan_because: Anything to help a fellow rancher

lenders.name: Amy
lenders.loan_because: "Do justice, love mercy, walk humbly with God."
lenders.occupational_info: I minister to a congregation of urban folks who are committed to social justice, and who care about all God's people all over the world.

lenders.name: Norma
lenders.loan_because: I want to help so they can have a better opportunity in their life.

lenders.name: Nidhi
lenders.loan_because: I've seen firsthand, working in India and Namibia, how far a small loan can take someone. I think everyone deserves a chance and I believe in helping to give people choices and opportunities.
lenders.occupational_info: I work at a think tank based in Baltimore, MD. I work in public health, mainly in biodefense and biosecurity.

lenders.name: Ross
lenders.loan_because: I believe that investing in people brings great  returns.
lenders.occupational_info: Manage wealth for 300 families.

lenders.name: Joan
lenders.loan_because: It may help others who have little to do better.
lenders.occupational_info: retired teacher of children

lenders.name: Peggy
lenders.loan_because: giving is better than receiving.  Shout out to all who joined on Christmas Day '07 !!
lenders.occupational_info: I am now retired (no longer work), but used to be a chemist and made new drugs for a large pharmaceutical company in the USA

lenders.name: Golden Egg
lenders.loan_because: Due to others helping me, I am now able to help others.

lenders.name: Will Minnig
lenders.loan_because: I'm fortunate enough to make small contributions so I do.
lenders.occupational_info: I work oversee the creative team at a nationally-renowned health system.

lenders.name: Michael
lenders.loan_because: It is simply the right thing to do.
lenders.occupational_info: I develop drawings for the construction of transportation systems.

lenders.name: Teresa & Raphael
lenders.loan_because: it's money that empowers the recipient to generate his or her own success, and can be paid forward for the indefinite future.

lenders.name: Robert
lenders.loan_because: I want to make a positive impact in the world

lenders.name: Dan
lenders.loan_because: It's the right thing to do.
lenders.occupational_info: I'm a retired child psychotherapist.

lenders.name: Jan
lenders.loan_because: It makes a difference.
lenders.occupational_info: Freelance writer and editor. Many of my articles and essays deal with my experiences in Africa and living in Mexico; basic human rights issues, as well as wildlife conservation.

lenders.name: Scott and Alexis
lenders.loan_because: It feels good to help others help themselves!

lenders.name: Don
lenders.loan_because: I care for those living in poverty around the world.
lenders.occupational_info: I operated Railroad trains and engines.

lenders.name: Roseanna
lenders.loan_because: It is important and helps me be connected to others in the world.
lenders.occupational_info: I teach adults how to read and write better so they can get into college.

lenders.name: Lianne
lenders.loan_because:
People help people. That's life.

How wonderful it is that nobody need wait a single moment before starting to improve the world.  ~Anne Frank

Live simply that others might simply live.  ~Elizabeth Ann Seton

If you can't feed a hundred people, then feed just one.  ~Mother Teresa

A bone to the dog is not charity.  Charity is the bone shared with the dog, when you are just as hungry as the dog.  ~Jack London

lenders.name: Grandma_Burkes
lenders.loan_because: I believe every little bit given can make the world a better place!
lenders.occupational_info: I am a director/professor at a college in Arkansas, USA.

lenders.name: James
lenders.loan_because: We as Americans have a good life here, all things considered.  It is not hard to part with 50 or 100 dollars knowing it is truly needed and has a purpose.  Some of us pay more than that for our own cable television, a luxury.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a musician (drums) who also works at a large music retailer as a sales manager.

lenders.name: Lisa
lenders.loan_because: because I can, because I should...do more.
lenders.occupational_info: entrepreneur in the business of changing lives

lenders.name: BonnieBeth
lenders.occupation: i work at the library & play at the beach
lenders.loan_because:
isn't life grand!
how can i NOT loan $25?

lenders.name: Adam
lenders.loan_because: I want to help create the world that I want to live in.
lenders.occupational_info: I make music!

lenders.name: Ginny
lenders.loan_because: I'm thrilled to have received this Christmas gift from my daughter.
lenders.occupational_info: I own a children's retail store .

lenders.name: Eric
lenders.loan_because: Because loans helped me with entrepeneurial pursuits and I like being able to return the favor in a direct way.
lenders.occupational_info: The universal language of music.

lenders.name: Joanne
lenders.loan_because: People help people.  Corporations help themselves.

lenders.name: Carolyn & Bill
lenders.loan_because: We're able, we want to help, and we enjoy following the hard work of people working to improve their and their family's lives.
lenders.occupational_info: Retired

lenders.name: Lisa Guillory
lenders.loan_because: I think micro-loans are a great way to help others reach their dreams.
lenders.occupational_info: I'm an audiologist, diagnosing hearing and dizziness disorders at a VA Hospital.

lenders.name: SharonM
lenders.loan_because: It is always a blessing to give...I believe in the seven principles of Nguzo Saba (Kwanzaa) that reminds us the value of collective work and responsibility...it is our only real purpose...to love and care for one another.
lenders.occupational_info: I teach others how to teach others.

lenders.name: Demetria and Sylvie
lenders.loan_because: We loan because we believe it is God's Divine Will for every woman and every girl to have adequate nutrition, bodily integrity,  a sound education, and good healthcare.  Loaning creates an opportunity to assist with financial independence - the soil in  which these divine gifts grow.

lenders.name: Al
lenders.loan_because: It's the Christian thing to do - to help out my fellow mankind that's in need. God has blessed me.  I follow Jesus' example and bless those around me.
lenders.occupational_info: I increase productivity & efficiency  at a manufacturing plant.  I graduated from the University of South Carolina and graduate school at Auburn University.

lenders.name: Sean
lenders.loan_because: i can
lenders.occupational_info: very boring

lenders.name: Lindsay
lenders.occupational_info: I conduct outreach and education in the African immigrant community in the Washington DC metro area. I represent African women and girls facing gender-based violence in immigration proceedings.

lenders.name: Jennifer
lenders.loan_because: It is wonderful to try to help directly if I can. Good Luck!!
lenders.occupational_info: I answer phones, handle lost and Found items for belongings of patients in the hospital in our town.

lenders.name: Lindsey
lenders.loan_because: I care.

lenders.name: Jinit
lenders.loan_because: I believe everyone has a right to prosper and lead a happy life!

lenders.name: Gary M.
lenders.loan_because: I believe in empowering people to help themselves. The people here asking for help are highly motivated to better themselves and to in turn bless those around them.
lenders.occupational_info: As an Occupational Therapist I assist people with how to overcome the challenges they face from physical and/or psychosocial disabilities, so that they can experience optimal function and independence in their daily lives.

lenders.name: Mary Sue
lenders.loan_because: A small amount can do so much!

lenders.name: Beth
lenders.loan_because: It's a great way to pay it forward.

lenders.name: Peter
lenders.loan_because: Overland Park, KS

lenders.name: Jason
lenders.loan_because: I can.
lenders.occupational_info: I'm still trying to figure that out.

lenders.name: Joey
lenders.loan_because: someone should!

lenders.name: Carol
lenders.loan_because: After watching Frontline World and seeing the good work Kiva is doing, I realized just how easy it is to make a difference in the world.  If all of us gives a little, it adds up to so much.
lenders.occupational_info: I retired after working at various jobs for 37 years.  However, as a volunteer and a writer, I am busier than when I was working at a full-time paid job.  I enjoy giving back to my community.

lenders.name: Joel
lenders.occupational_info: I paint realistic watercolours and take photographs of themes found in nature which I like to reflect the Master Artist's creation.

lenders.name: izet
lenders.loan_because: love to help other people

lenders.name: The Lorax
lenders.loan_because: I want to help people helping themselves. I also want to see the impact of my loan. Where's the satisfaction in sending a hundred bucks to a multi-million dollar charity?
lenders.occupational_info: I fly planes.  Really small, fast planes.

lenders.name: Edward
lenders.loan_because: I care.

lenders.name: A/M Family Fund
lenders.loan_because: Aiding sustainable economic development is critical to reducing poverty.
lenders.occupational_info: We are a family primarily from Vancouver Canada who choose to provide funds to Kiva as opposed to purchasing gifts for one another at Christmas and other holidays. We will grow this fund over time with the goal of making a continued and increasingly larger impact on poverty in Africa.

lenders.name: Maria
lenders.loan_because: Giving to others is giving to myself
lenders.occupational_info: Veterinary public health reseach, teaching, and outreach.

lenders.name: Joseph
lenders.loan_because: I think the Kiva approach is a great way to help people improve their lives at small cost to lenders. Hopefully, some day, the entrepreneurs will be able to become lenders to help others.
lenders.occupational_info: I am retired from a career in Aerospace engineering and now volunteer with Habitat for Humanity and other community organizations.

lenders.name: Casey
lenders.occupational_info: I build computer software that is used by the government.

lenders.name: Cory Thorson
lenders.loan_because: I think people are generally good. I  also think hard work is valuable, and honest work makes people virtuous.  If my $25 can help someone grow a business, work hard, and serve their community, then I feel pretty good about my contribution. Also, it is almost no risk, they pay me back later. This is better than a handout. Once they pay the loan back, I can loan the same $25 again.
lenders.occupational_info: I sell school uniforms.

lenders.name: J.T.
lenders.loan_because: I love being able to help others. It's just that simple

lenders.name: Alex
lenders.loan_because: I know it sounds cliche, But Jesus askes us to take care of the poor. I studied developmental economics at school and this really is one way to make a difference.

lenders.name: Robert
lenders.loan_because: I have more gifts than I need.  The money I loan will make a much greater difference in the lives of others than in mine.  We are all diminished in some way when others don't have the chance to have a good life.
lenders.occupational_info: Photographer

lenders.name: Danny Daemonic
lenders.loan_because: I can.

lenders.name: Bernie
lenders.loan_because: I want to give of myself to help others.

lenders.name: Lynn
lenders.loan_because: I believe that helping the small business person is part of the answer.
lenders.occupational_info: I'm retired, so work is a distant memory.  Worked for 45 years in private and public security.

lenders.name: Vikas
lenders.loan_because: it's fun! ("Now is that a good reason for doing something so earnest, so purposeful, so noble as this?" You're right I'm afraid - it isn't. Sorry!)
lenders.occupational_info: I practice symbol juggling. It is not as glamorous as juggling balls, hoops or clubs I admit, but it pays better (and leaves something to spare for Kiva.) Try it!

lenders.name: Robert
lenders.loan_because: It's the least thing I can do given how much financially better off I am than the vast majority of my fellow humans (because of many advantages I've had, not because I am more capable!)
lenders.occupational_info: I am a medical doctor and take care of college students at a large university.

lenders.name: Spencer
lenders.loan_because: it's a good thing to do
lenders.occupational_info: designing and maintaining websites

lenders.name: Darin and Kim
lenders.occupational_info: Computer security software sales / engineering (Darin). Student of Occupational Therapy (Kim)

lenders.name: Steve
lenders.loan_because: I love new business opportunities and it is a way for people to help themselves.
lenders.occupational_info: Adjunct Professor, Real Estate Broker, Homebuilder

lenders.name: Gunther
lenders.loan_because: I have been blessed by God and would like to empower other farmers in the developing world to increase the economic viability of there agricultural endeavors.

lenders.name: maggie
lenders.loan_because:
I can.
Gandhi said we must "be the change we wish to see."

lenders.name: Chris Vaughn
lenders.loan_because: I want to help

lenders.name: One Love
lenders.loan_because: I want to spread the LOVE.

lenders.name: Patricia
lenders.loan_because: I want to extend a hand-up to those who need help to become successful and support their families.
lenders.occupational_info: Now retired... creating art work and volunteering with the Salvation Army.

lenders.name: Samuel
lenders.loan_because: I love to help where I can.
lenders.occupational_info: I run machines in a Paper Mill Plant.

lenders.name: Mary & Bob
lenders.loan_because: We loan to hopefully make a difference in the lives of people, and to foster a sense of well being in the recipients.
lenders.occupational_info:
Mary taught public elementary school. She taught children ages 6 and 7 years old to read, write, and learn about people and all kinds of things.  
Bob helped children and families, with all kinds of behavioral and emotional problems, to improve, and to get along together.

lenders.name: Scott
lenders.loan_because: I'm a huge believer in the power of microloans, as they give so many people around the world opportunities they would not otherwise have.

lenders.name: Steve
lenders.loan_because: I believe in helping entrepreneurs succeed.
lenders.occupational_info: Helping businesses be more profitable.

lenders.name: Jeannine & Jon
lenders.loan_because: We loan because we love to help people in need who work hard and deserve a chance to succeed.
lenders.occupational_info: Jeannine helps create technical solutions (computer applications) to support a pharmaceutical company's sales force. In her spare time she is a potter and also trains for triathlons. Jon works on television/video/film crews and is also a great singer/songwriter and is involved in the music industry.

lenders.name: Christine
lenders.loan_because: Give a man a fish and he'll eat for a day, but give him a fishing rod and he'll never go hungry.

lenders.name: Frances
lenders.loan_because: I am an 11 year old student and I want to help women in other countries to support themselves and their families

lenders.name: Ron
lenders.loan_because: I believe in people and want to provide an opportunity for other business people
lenders.occupational_info: Manage my own business

lenders.name: Andrew
lenders.loan_because: My brother joined the Peace Corps and witnessed poverty first hand.  Since hearing his tales, my entire family has become more conscious of the importance of money and capitalism in developing countries.

lenders.name: Ruby Ryder
lenders.loan_because: Life is about helping others and spreading the Love.
lenders.occupational_info: My work is my passion.

lenders.name: Vasuki
lenders.loan_because: A little help goes a long way.
lenders.occupational_info: Engineer

lenders.name: Anna
lenders.loan_because: its a very easy and helpful thing to do - and because we have so much excess in this part of the world.

lenders.name: Sherry
lenders.loan_because:
This is a fabulous program!  It is easy, inspiring & personal!  
My daughter, Jenny & I had a BLAST with this - Christmas investing was a hoot!   The entrepreneur's orders were filled so FAST that before we could finish "shopping," we missed out on partnering with some of our favorites!    We had to keep scouring the board to grab someone before they were all gone!!!!    My grandkitty, Lucy, even made a selection from Senegal, Africa - FISH venders - Yum-o!  She's hoping they pay interest in product!
lenders.occupational_info: The picture is our dog Peaceful.  It was the day before he went to "meet his Maker."  We figure he was "cramming for finals!"  He's got his little tongue out like he's "feasting on the Word!"

lenders.occupational_info: I am a college student

lenders.occupational_info: Easy but mentally taxing somtimes.

lenders.name: Dan
lenders.loan_because: I hopefully can help someone in need. I know there were times in my life that I needed someone there for me, I just hope that my small loans will let me be there for someone in need.
lenders.occupational_info: Full time student working on my MBA

lenders.name: Darren
lenders.loan_because: I would like others to suceed in life as I have. I'm by far rich but enjoy life like others should.
lenders.occupational_info: Keeping the peace protecting the public

lenders.name: BethBeth
lenders.loan_because: How could I not?   When the cost of one dinner and a movie can mean the difference between 'existing' and 'living' for a family?  Carry your lunch one day a month and you can help three times as many people!   I love it, I absolutely love it!  What power KIVA gives to my meager offerings.  It also makes the best 'occasion'  gift for those who already have all the 'stuff' they need.
lenders.occupational_info:
Alternative healthcare has been a lifelong passion.  I have added colon cleansing to my skills and find great satisfaction in watching as clients regain their health, vitality, and quality of life.
Former Director of Operations of GPACT.org, I also enjoy writing, research, and the great outdoors.  Time in the woods are like a spiritual renewal for me.

lenders.name: Daniel
lenders.loan_because: I've started two businesses on my own, and wish to encourage the entrepeneurial spirit.

lenders.name: Kevin & Ron

I think it's the right thing to do. 
I'm doing this in memory of the love of my life "Lucy" (pictured). I have had many pets, but she was more than that she was my baby girl. I miss her so!!!!
lenders.occupational_info: I work with computers helping others keep their information safe.

lenders.name: Paul
lenders.loan_because: what's small change to me can make a big difference in the life of someone in a third-world country.

lenders.name: Craig
lenders.loan_because: God has blessed us and given my family the awesome privilege of reaching out to others.  I have  spent time in Kenya, Sudan, and Uganda. By giving a little we can help to improve a families quality of life in a tremendous way.
lenders.occupational_info: I am involved in ministry to others both in the U.S. and in Africa.  I have worked extensively with refugees and have traveled to Africa numerous times.

lenders.loan_because: I want to help people who can make a difference in their community
lenders.occupational_info: My wife and I are entrepreneurs and we feel being part of our community and helping others is an important part of life. Giving back makes us feel good and our work at Bowie Salon and Spa allows us to help people feel good about themselves.

lenders.name: Tim
lenders.loan_because:
It's awesome to think that I can make a world of difference. Good things happen to good people. 

"How wonderful it is that nobody needs to wait a single moment before starting to improve the world." Frank, Anne (1929-1945)
lenders.occupational_info:
By day I work for an electrical construction company. I manage people, provide cost estimates and purchase materials. The types of projects we build are factories, stores, restaurants and office spaces. 

At night I sing orginal punk rock music. Check out my band's Myspace page link below and prepare to be entertained.

lenders.name: Donna
lenders.loan_because: I want to support less fortunate entrepreneurs. I was a single welfare mom at one time, so I know how tough it can be to get ahead. I want to give back, make a difference and create good karma.
lenders.occupational_info: I am dedicated to my career and sell homes for a living on the West Coast of British Columbia. I really enjoy my work and have been selling real estate since 1987. I am launching my own real estate company and hope to do well so I can contribute more to this worthy cause.

lenders.name: Eileen
lenders.loan_because: I want to help out where I can. I love the way Kiva loans allow you to actually see the recipients and the progress made towards their goals. It's a very personal and individual process.
lenders.occupational_info: I run a smallish talent management company in Southern California. We rep local actors for both film and television. I love what I do and I wildly encourage entrepreneurship.

lenders.name: Kent
lenders.loan_because: After seeing on PBS the smiles, happiness, expectations of these small-business owners, I wanted to be a part of this marvelous process.

(Brian) Excavation - Earth/dirt moving with big excavator machines and also builds bridges for Whatcom County, Wash.
(Dawn) Works for Childcare Worldwide as the choir assistant for the Ugandan Orphans Chior who sing & perform all over the United States to promote sponsorship for children in 3rd world countries.

lenders.loan_because:
mom & i believe a small token provides hard working
people with the means to make possibilities happen.
we are both fortunate & want to share our money to help those in need.
lenders.occupational_info: i started with little money, but a dream & goal to build a career that would provide me with what i need. i am a successful hairdresser now, many years since that dream started & am thankful for all those who believed in me. although it wasn't always easy, my motivation carried me through, and with that, i am now financially comfortable enough to help others to achieve their goals.

lenders.name: Diane

lenders.name: Erin

"Hold fast to dreams, for if dreams die, life is a broken winged bird that cannot fly."

lenders.occupational_info: I run a multiple restaurants for large corporations and I also have my own business of restaurant management & consulting firm

lenders.loan_because: I think microfinance presents a revolutionary opportunity to eliminate poverty one family at a time.

lenders.loan_because: I can.

lenders.loan_because: I like being able to have a positive effect, halfway around the world.
lenders.occupational_info: I write computer software. I might have had something to do with the software in your mobile phone.

lenders.name: Kamyar and Parastoo
lenders.loan_because: We wanted to show our daughter that we all can make an impact on a global level, even with minimal contributions. We are paying forward our good fortunes.

lenders.name: Jenn
lenders.occupation: Nurse - Newborn and Infant Critical Care
lenders.loan_because: I can!
lenders.occupational_info: I help to care for the teeny, vulnerable, ill little ones.

lenders.name: Terry
lenders.loan_because: I want to help people to become independent & self-supporting.
lenders.occupational_info: I visit new mothers in their homes to teach them how to breastfeed & care for their premature babies.   I also see TB patients to stop the spread of TB.  The people who live with a TB patient are tested & given medication if needed.

lenders.name: Taylor
lenders.loan_because: Kiva makes it so easy to help people in need. And not just help them temporarily, but so that they can provide for themselves in the future and help to grow their country's economy.
lenders.occupational_info: I'm a sophomore in college. I plan to study geography and international studies for the rest of my life and travel as much as possible.

lenders.name: Joe & Lieu Ann
lenders.loan_because: I want to make a difference.  I believe a hand up, can help the individual, their family, and their community.  I don't have a lot of money but, with a Micro loan, a little gos a long way.
lenders.occupational_info: I design packaging {Foam Wood Corrugated} to protect things like computers, monitors, industrial equipment, small electronics.  I also figure out how to manufacture our products.

lenders.name: Henry
lenders.loan_because: I can
lenders.occupational_info: Customer Service for an insurance company dealing mostly with elderly, retired, and disabled.

lenders.name: Chelsea
lenders.loan_because: I believe all of the lenders in Kiva do so because it feeds our soul.  Our combined efforts help to create a better world, one small step at a time.

lenders.name: Art
lenders.loan_because: Since retiring in 2003, I felt it was time to give back. I have be fortunate in my life, no major sickness and a good job for 31 years. I volunteer for Habitat For Humanity twice a week, which makes me feel wonderful inside. Now I would like to spread my help past the local area.
lenders.occupational_info: I build custom motorcycles and custom trikes. This style of machine are based on the American V-Twin motor. I do this to keep busy in retirement.

lenders.name: Austin
lenders.loan_because: I think it's a great way to invest in human capital.

lenders.name: Darcy
lenders.loan_because: I can

lenders.name: Gus
lenders.loan_because: I feel lucky for what I have, and I want to share it with people less fornunate than me.

lenders.name: Patrick
lenders.loan_because: I believe in the spirit of micro finance, helping hard working people prosper who otherwise would not have the opportunity to do so.

lenders.name: STEVE & WENDY
lenders.loan_because: THIS PROGRAM IS A WONDERFUL WAY TO HELP PEOPLE WHO CAN REALLY USE THE HELP!!!!

lenders.name: Anne & Ryan Fisher
lenders.loan_because: We believe it's our duty to help those people trying to help them selves.

lenders.name: Dennis
lenders.loan_because: I like the idea of an individual, one-on-one aid program with adequate oversight for audit, progress and check and balance purposes.  This Kiva system is a down to earth, common sense program.  It's one good way to "love your neighbor."
lenders.occupational_info: I seek the truth and try to do good through my freelance writing.

lenders.name: Hanna
lenders.loan_because: My mum came as an immigrant from a third world country and has been in the U.S. ever since. Someone gave her a chance for a better life, so I would like to do the same.
lenders.occupational_info: Right now, recovering from major surgery. I still bake & cook, a great deal for friends/family. I hope one day to be able to help another person out there, who so truly needs it.

lenders.name: Ken Hillyer
lenders.loan_because: entrepreneurship improves lives and communities

lenders.name: Jerral
lenders.loan_because:
Early in my life I had mentors who believed in me and helped me to succeed.  Long ago I committed to return the favor.  So, as soon as I was successful in some of my small businesses, I wanted to see if I couldn't also help young people and mid-life career changers to be successful, too.  I have been able to do exactly that, several times over. 

.
lenders.occupational_info:
As a handwriting analyst, I learn about people (and help them learn about themselves) from their handwriting.  I match people in relationships or business, and help solve mysteries, frauds and difficulties where things are handwritten.  I wrote a book to help others learn these skills:  THE HAND BEHIND THE WORD.

As a hospice caregiver, I help people dying of AIDS or Cancer or other degenerative diseases to be more comfortable in their final days.  I wrote a book to help others learn these skills:  URGENT WHISPERS: Care of the Dying. 

I also help businesses protect customers' financial and personal information, in order to comply with laws, regulations and good business practice.

.

lenders.name: Bill
lenders.loan_because: Others are not as lucky as I have been.  I want to provide economic self-sufficiency to others in the world.
lenders.occupational_info: A college setting - providing support to students and staff using computers and the internet.

lenders.name: Lance
lenders.loan_because: I believe that capitalism can be a driving force towards solving many of the world's problems.
lenders.occupational_info: I help customers who are experiencing issues when purchasing music or videos from the online iTunes Store. I am also an artist that works on large-scale structural sculpture.

lenders.name: Denise
lenders.loan_because:
The Guest is inside you, and also inside me;
you know the sprout is hidden inside the seed.
We are all struggling; none of us has gone far.
Let your arrogance go, and look around inside.

The blue sky opens out farther and farther,
the daily sense of failure goes away,
the damage I have done to myself fades,
a million suns come forward with light,
when I sit firmly in that world.

I hear bells ringing that no one has shaken;
inside"love" there is more joy than we know of;
rain pours down, although the sky is clear of clouds;
there are whole rivers of light.
The universe is shot through in all parts by a single sort of love.
How hard it is to feel that joy in all our four bodies!

Those who hope to be reasonable about it fail.
The arrogance of reason has separated us from that love.
With the word "reason" you already feel miles away.

How lucky Kabir is, that surrounded by all this joy
he sings inside his own little boat.
His poems amount to one soul meeting another.
These songs are about forgetting dying and loss.
They rise above both coming in and going out. 
kabir

lenders.name: Truman
lenders.loan_because: I travel around the world, building infrastructure, and I care about helping people create economic stability in their lives.

lenders.name: Michael Yanikoski
lenders.loan_because: I loan because it is only right that everyone should get the opportunity to prosper and make something better out of what they started with.
lenders.occupational_info: I work at a desk in Boston, talking to clients all day.

lenders.name: Susan
lenders.loan_because: I want to help make a difference in the world  by enabling people to help themselves.  I  have been fortunate enough to be the recipient of helpful people and would like to pay it forward.  This is such a brilliant and worthy idea by the Flannerys and I am so excited to be part of this.
lenders.occupational_info: I seek and find marketing professionals for businesses in a variety of industries.

lenders.name: Matthew
lenders.loan_because: I feel that everyone has a right to happiness.
lenders.occupational_info: I'm a marketer. I help people make their businesses and products reach more customers.

lenders.name: Bo Bo
lenders.loan_because: I have a soft spot in my heart for defenseless women who need to be protected.  I, also, like fish and especially enjoy angling & riding motorcycles with my dad.  I know she will love her new wheels!  I think Mrs. Chea Mom and I could be "best friends!"
lenders.occupational_info: It is my job to  make sure the whole household remains safe, secure and well exercised.

lenders.loan_because: I think it can make a difference where macro lending cannot.

lenders.occupational_info: Giving to help others isn't work.. it is a passion!

lenders.name: Eldon&Delphine

lenders.name: Richard

lenders.occupational_info:
I work as a welder and pipefitter in Construction.  I install piping systems in all types of building.  A pipe fitter is diferent that a plumber in that we install primaraly process piping.  A plumber installs sanitary piping and potable water system.  

We intall piping in HVAC systems for heating and cooling, and process piping in such industries and paper mills,  Steel Mills, and the like.  We also do hospitals , comercial buildings and the like.

lenders.name: Patricia

lenders.name: Richard
lenders.loan_because: This seems like a great way to get money directly to people who are working to improve their lives.
lenders.occupational_info:
I work for a public school system most of the year.
During the summer I run a sport fishing guide service.

lenders.name: Marc
lenders.loan_because: I believe in teaching a person to fish, not to hand them food. I'm excited that this gives people the opportunity to earn money and be self-sufficient rather than just taking it. It's a great idea to help those who want to be proud and achieve something despite having limited means.
lenders.occupational_info: I work with celebrities who have been on television and help them earn a living.

lenders.occupational_info: Helping agencies, developers and owners construct their building projects.

lenders.name: Zachary

lenders.occupational_info: I am a student studying and trying to find my place in the wide world of international politics.

That leap and act of faith is the vision that life offers.
